title: Australian Designers show their talents [excerpt from Australian Diary No. 007]
creator_contributor_role: Australian National Film Board, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Fashion
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Fashion - Australia

Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Clothing and dress
abstract: It's only natural that a land that helps clothe the world should take a keen interest in fashion!
description: We take a look back at some Australian designs from 1947. Woollen suits, sporty tennis outfits, debutantes gowns, plastic high-heeled shoes! hats and bridal wear are all paraded in this high-end extravaganza of Australian style. Source: NFSA Film Australia Collection
